short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reimplementation of Emillie Thiselton's Pycee. Works on online-python.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever users get errors on online-python.com, Pycee 2.0 shows relevant solutions from StackOverflow to the user.

Pycee 2.0 extension automatically queries Stack Overflow to provide customised and summarised information within the IDE.

Users can change the number of solutions being shown by clicking on the extension and changing the solutions slider.
